name: 巴门尼德
bio_short: 古希腊哲学家，埃利亚学派的创始人。他被认为是“形而上学之父”，其核心思想是“存在者存在，非存在者不存在”，并因此否认“变化”和“运动”的真实性。
bio_short_en: An ancient Greek philosopher and founder of the Eleatic school. Considered the 'father of metaphysics,' his core idea was 'what is, is; what is not, is not,' which led him to deny the reality of change and motion.
